channel.title: Git on Notes

item.title: Backup Repository with a Github Action Workflow
item.description: I always like to have a backup copy of all my important git repositories hosted on Github.

item.title: Git Info Variables on Hugo
item.description: Enable Git Info Variables Enable .GitInfo object for each page (if the Hugo site is versioned by Git).

item.title: Working with Git Stash
item.description: Git stash is a great set of commands while working on volatile porjects where you are just trying out a proof of concept or a module.

item.title: Using a remote repository with Glitch.com
item.description: Glitch is a online workspace that support javascript for development with live previews.

item.title: Deploy a NodeJS application using Git
item.description: Remote Repository on Deployment Server Create two folders named project.git and project.
